```{r}
#load required packages
library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)

#read in data
homicides <- read_csv (file = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/data-homicides/master/homicide-data.csv")
homicides

#filter for baltimore homicides
baltimore <- homicides %>%
  filter(city == "Baltimore")
```
